short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make the new reddit design (sh.reddit.com) respect the system theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The latest Reddit design does not currently sync to your system's chosen theme. This extension will fix that by automatically switching between light mode or dark mode depending on which one you have selected in your OS.

Please note: I am not the original creator of this code. It was created by the user rouv3n on Reddit and the code is distributed under the MIT license.
